content.text:
I've reviewed both files. The cleanup plan has almost everything checked off. There is only ONE remaining unchecked task:

**specs/README.md** — Fix tokenizer-embedding description ("Embedded" → "Bundled")

input.old_string: | Embedded tokenizer files for offline inference |
input.new_string: | Bundled tokenizer files for offline inference |

input.command: git add specs/README.md plans/cleanup/buddy-llm.md && git commit -m "Fix Embedded to Bundled in specs README"

content.text: That was the last remaining task in the cleanup plan. All items are now checked off.

result: All cleanup tasks complete. Every item in the cleanup plan is now checked off.
